arStrings.szText:
{c_label}All damage increased by: {c_number}{s1}{/c}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Can be increased by skills, items, and attack.

{c_label}Dodge Chance: {c_number}{s1}{/c}{/c}
{icon:bullet} The chance to dodge incoming attacks.
{icon:bullet} Dodged attacks do no damage.
{icon:bullet} Dodge chance can be increased by skills and items.

{c_label}Damage Reduction: {c_number}{s1}{/c}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Damage reduction can be increased with Armor.

{c_label}Life Regen per Second: {c_number}{s1}{/c}{/c}
{icon:bullet} The amount of Life recovered each second.

{c_label}Life Steal: {c_number}{s1}{/c}{/c}
{icon:bullet} {c_number}{s2}{/c} of damage you cause will be recovered as Life.
{icon:bullet} Life Steal is less effective when you are higher Level.
   {icon:bullet} At Level {c_number}60{/c}, Life Steal gains a {c_number}0.10x{/c} multiplier.
   {icon:bullet} At Level {c_number}70{/c}, Life Steal no longer functions.
{icon:bullet} Life Steal can be increased by skills and items.

{c_label}Gold Find: {/c}{c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Increases gold found on monsters.

{c_label}Magic Find: {/c}{c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Increases your chance to find higher-quality items.
{icon:bullet} This increase is diminished for rare and legendary and set items.
{icon:bullet} You may have a maximum of {c_number}+300.00%{/c} Magic Find.

{c_label}Maximum Mana: {/c}{c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Can be increased by skills and items.

{c_label}Maximum Fury: {/c}{c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Can be increased by skills and items.

{c_label}Maximum Arcane Power: {c_number}{s1}{/c}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Can be increased by skills and items.

{c_label}Maximum Spirit: {/c}{c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Can be increased by skills and items.

{c_label}Maximum Hatred: {/c}{c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Can be increased by skills and items.

{c_label}Maximum Discipline: {/c}{c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Can be increased by skills and items.

{c_label}Mana Regenerated per Second: {/c}{c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Can be increased by skills and items.

{c_label}Arcane Power Regenerated per Second: {/c}{c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Can be increased by skills and items.

{c_label}Hatred Regenerated per Second: {/c}{c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Can be increased by skills and items.

{c_label}Discipline Regenerated per Second: {/c}{c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Can be increased by items.

{c_label}Spirit Regenerated per Second: {/c}{c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Can be increased by skills and items.

{c_label}All damage increased by: {c_number}{s1}{/c}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Increased by your skills.

{c_label}Crowd Control Reduction:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Reduces the duration of control impairing effects, including Stun, Slow, Freeze, Fear and Charm.

{c_label}Missile Damage Reduction:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Reduces damage from missile attacks.

{c_label}Melee Damage Reduction:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Reduces damage from melee attacks.

{c_label}Total Life Bonus:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Your overall Life is increased by an additional {c_number}{s2}{/c}.

{c_label}Health Globe Healing Bonus:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Picking up a health globe or using a potion heals you for additional Life.

{c_label}Bonus to Gold/Globe Radius:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c} yards
{icon:bullet} You will automatically pick up gold and health globes from farther away.

{c_label}Bonus Experience per Kill: {/c}{c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Every monster killed grants up to {c_number}{s2}{/c} additional experience.

{c_label}Maximum Wrath: {/c}{c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Can be increased by items.

{c_label}Elite Damage Reduction:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Reduces damage from elites monsters and other players.

{c_label}All damage to elites and other players increased by: {c_number}{s1}{/c}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Increased by your items.

{c_label}Cooldown Reduction:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Reduces cooldown of all active skills.

{c_label}Wrath Regenerated per Second: {/c}{c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Can be increased by skills and items.

{c_label}Life per Fury Spent: {c_number}{s1}{/c}{/c}
{icon:bullet} You will recover {c_number}{s2}{/c} Life for every point of Fury spent.

{c_label}Life per Spirit Spent: {c_number}{s1}{/c}{/c}
{icon:bullet} You will recover {c_number}{s2}{/c} Life for every point of Spirit you spend.

{c_label}Fury Regenerated per Second: {/c}{c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Can be increased by skills and items.

{c_label}Attack Speed Increase: {c_number}{s1}{/c}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Can be increased by skills and items.

{c_label}Arcane Power On Crit: {c_number}{s1}{/c}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Can be increased by skills and items.

{c_label}Fury Cost Reduction: {/c}{c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Can be increased by items.

{c_label}Hatred Cost Reduction: {/c}{c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Can be increased by items.

{c_label}Wrath Cost Reduction: {/c}{c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Can be increased by items.

{c_label}Spirit Cost Reduction: {/c}{c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Can be increased by items.

{c_label}Arcane Power Cost Reduction: {/c}{c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Can be increased by items.

{c_label}Mana Cost Reduction: {/c}{c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Can be increased by items.

{c_label}Discipline Cost Reduction: {/c}{c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Can be increased by items.

{c_label}Overpower Damage Bonus:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Overpower deals bonus damage based on the sum of your current health and fortified health.
{icon:bullet} Can be increased by willpower, skills, and items.
{icon:bullet} Capped at {c_number}{s2}{/c} against other players.

{c_label}{s1} Damage Increase:{/c} {c_number}{s2}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Increases Damage dealt by this skill.
Outside of Melee Range Damage Bonus
Chance to cause Vulnerable On Hit
Chance to cause Vulnerable On Crit
Damage Bonus to Knocked Down Targets
Outside of Melee Range Crit Chance Bonus

{c_label}Lucky Hit: Up to 5% chance to absorb{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c} {c_label}heal on target{/c}
{icon:bullet} Can be increased by items.

{c_label}Intelligence:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c} {c_lightgray}(Item Contribution: {c_blue}{s4}{/c}){/c}{s2}
{icon:bullet} Increases Resistance to All Elements by {c_number}{s3}{/c}

{c_label}Chance to Stun On Hit:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} {c_label}Lucky Hit: {/c}Chance on hit to Stun.

{c_label}Chance to Slow On Hit:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} {c_label}Lucky Hit: {/c}Chance on hit to Slow.

{c_label}Chance to Immobilize On Hit:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} {c_label}Lucky Hit: {/c}Chance on hit to Immobilize.

{c_label}Chance to Confuse On Hit:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} {c_label}Lucky Hit: {/c}Chance on hit to Confuse.

{c_label}Chance to Weaken On Hit:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} {c_label}Lucky Hit: {/c}Chance on hit to Weaken.

{c_label}Chance to Chill On Hit:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} {c_label}Lucky Hit: {/c}Chance on hit to Chill.

{c_label}Chance to Freeze On Hit:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} {c_label}Lucky Hit: {/c}Chance on hit to Freeze.

{c_label}Chance to Knockdown On Hit:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} {c_label}Lucky Hit: {/c}Chance on hit to Knock Down.

{c_label}Chance to Stun On Crit:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Chance to Stun on critical strikes.

{c_label}Chance to Slow On Crit:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Chance to Knockdown on critical strikes.

{c_label}Chance to Immobilize On Crit:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Chance to Immobilize on critical strikes.

{c_label}Chance to Confuse On Crit:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Chance to Confuse on hit.

{c_label}Chance to Weaken On Crit:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Chance to weaken on critical strikes.

{c_label}Chance to Chill On Crit:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Chance to Chill on hit.

{c_label}Chance to Freeze On Crit:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Chance to Freeze on hit.

{c_label}Chance to Knockdown On Crit:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Chance to Immobilize on critical strikes.

{c_label}Damage Bonus to Stunned Targets:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Increases damage to Stunned Targets.

{c_label}Damage Bonus to Slowed Targets:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Increases damage to Slowed Targets.

{c_label}Damage Bonus to Immobilized Targets:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Increases damage to Immobilized Targets.

{c_label}Damage Bonus to Confused Targets:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Increases damage to Confused Targets.

{c_label}Damage Bonus to Weakened Targets:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Increases damage to Weakened Targets.

{c_label}Damage Bonus to Chilled Targets:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Increases damage to Chilled Targets.

{c_label}Damage Bonus to Frozen Targets:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Increases damage to Frozen Targets.

{c_label}Damage Bonus to Knocked Down Targets:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Increases damage to Knocked Down Targets.

{c_label}Melee Damage Bonus:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Increases damage dealt to targets within melee range.

{c_label}Outside of Melee Range Damage Bonus:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Increases damage dealt to targets outside of melee range.

{c_label}Melee Range Crit Chance Bonus:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Critical Strike chance bonus granted to targets within melee range.

{c_label}Outside of Melee Range Crit Chance Bonus:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Critical Strike chance bonus granted to targets outside of melee range.

{c_label}Bludgeoning Attack: {c_number}{s1}{/c}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Damage per hit while wielding a Bludgeoning Weapon.

{c_label}Slashing Attack: {c_number}{s1}{/c}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Damage per hit while wielding a Slashing Weapon.

{c_label}Dual Wield Attack: {c_number}{s1}{/c}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Damage per hit while dual wielding.

{c_label}Physical Damage Increase: {c_number}{s1}{/c}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Increase Physical damage dealt.

{c_label}Fire Damage Increase: {c_number}{s1}{/c}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Increase Fire damage dealt.

{c_label}Lightning Damage Increase: {c_number}{s1}{/c}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Increase Lightning damage dealt.

{c_label}Cold Damage Increase: {c_number}{s1}{/c}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Increase Cold damage dealt.

{c_label}Poison Damage Increase: {c_number}{s1}{/c}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Increase Poison damage dealt.

{c_label}Shadow Damage Increase: {c_number}{s1}{/c}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Increase Shadow damage dealt.

{c_label}Damage While Healthy:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Increases your damage while above {c_number}80%{/c} Life.

{c_label}Damage To Healthy Enemies:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Increases damage to enemies who are above {c_number}80%{/c} Life.

{c_label}Damage To Injured Enemies:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Increases damage to enemies who are below {c_number}35%{/c} Life.

{c_label}PvP Damage Reduction: {c_number}{s1}{/c}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Reduces damage taken from other players in PvP combat.

{c_label}Class Damage Reduction: {c_number}{s1}{/c}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Inherent damage reduction granted by your class.

{c_label}Ranged Damage Reduction:{/c} {c_number}{s1}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Reduces damage from ranged attacks.

{c_label}Damage Reduction While Evading: {c_number}{s1}{/c}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Increases your Damage Reduction while Evading.

{c_label}Potion Healing: {c_number}{s1}{/c}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Increases the healing done from potions.

{c_label}Damage Bonus To Vulnerable Targets: {c_number}{s1}{/c}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Increases damage to Vulnerable enemies.

{c_label}Maximum Energy: {c_number}{s1}{/c}{/c}
{icon:bullet} Can be increased by skills and items.
